body_html:
Is synchronous model not supported in general or just this demo doesn't support it? I did found it work when start individual works this way:

  if FLAGS.job_name == 'ps':
    server.join()
  else:
   # Do training

And it also runs by applying that pr. (not sure if it works expectedly).
body:
Is synchronous model not supported in general or just this demo doesn't support it? I did found it work when start individual works this way:

```
  if FLAGS.job_name == 'ps':
    server.join()
  else:
   # Do training
```

And it also runs by applying that pr. (not sure if it works expectedly).
